title: Dead Forest (Toter Wald)
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Gertrud A. Mellon
provenance_text:
Fritz Winter [1905-1976], Bavaria, Germany, until 1956; purchased from the artist by Gertrud Altegoer Mellon [1909-2005], New York, NY, 1956 until February 12, 1976 [1]; her gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1976 [2].

Notes:
[1]. See Gertrud Mellon's letter to Leon Arkus, dated January 2, 1976, in curatorial file.
[2]. The painting was accessioned on February 12, 1976.
